divs: sighting detailssame story as last submission. woke up before alarm clock, facing my window with open blinds. immediately see\notice object in early morning sky as brightest thing out there, hovering, moving oddly. this is the second time seeing it in three days so now i just want to know what it is! it doesn't seem to be anything made by humans. there's no known military base up there, no people. object was just hovering, less motion this time although moving closer to sierra peak in the cleveland national forest mountain range. hovered lower and lower slowly. i was scared but not as scared as last time, so stayed in bed just staring at it. was texting a friend again and that's how i lost sight although this time i'm pretty sure it just faded out or winked out as the sun came up.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around December 11th 2012
Summary: Same starlike bright object changing colors, hovering over mountains near Siera Peak/Cleveland National Forest.
